description: An extension of DCAT:Dataset to support Data Use Ontology terms.  A collection of one or more entities submitted by a single responsible party or authorizing agent.

rdfs:label.description: A human-readable name for the entity.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the JSON Schema that defines this object.

TerraDCAT_ap:hasDataUseModifier.title: hasDataUseModifier
TerraDCAT_ap:hasDataUseModifier.description: The Data Use Ontology term to indicate conditions for use of the data.

TerraDCAT_ap:hasDataSnapshot.title: hasDataSnapshot
TerraDCAT_ap:hasDataSnapshot.description: An available distribution of the Dataset.

TerraDCAT_ap:hasDataUsePermission.title: hasDataUseLimitation
TerraDCAT_ap:hasDataUsePermission.description: The Data Use Ontology term to indicate consent permissions for the use of the data.

TerraDCAT_ap:hasOriginalPublication.title: hasOriginalPublication
TerraDCAT_ap:hasOriginalPublication.description: The original publication associated with this Dataset or DataCollection.

TerraDCAT_ap:hasOwner.title: hasOwner
TerraDCAT_ap:hasOwner.description: The entity responsible for making the item available and responsible for identifying authorized users of the Dataset or DataCollection.

TerraDCAT_ap:hasCustodian.title: hasCustodian
TerraDCAT_ap:hasCustodian.description: The entity operationally responsible for managing the item and responsible for authorizing users of the Dataset or DataCollection.

title: Dataset
